Key Match Events: Philadelphia Phillies catcher J.T. Realmuto left in the fourth inning against the Miami Marlins after fouling a pitch off his left knee.
Realmuto sustained a contusion on the foul ball against Austin Kitchen in the second inning and returned to hit his second RBI single of the game.
With the Phillies ahead 7-0, Garrett Stubbs hit for Realmuto in the fourth inning.
